tool_description: Computes comprehensive clinical risk scores using validated risk assessment models for various clinical outcomes.

risk_model.description: Risk model to apply: cardiovascular, surgical, sepsis, readmission, mortality

error_messages: Invalid risk model: Use cardiovascular, surgical, sepsis, readmission, or mortality
Invalid demographics: Age must be 0-120, gender must be male/female/other
Invalid score ranges: All risk scores must be 0-100 when provided
Insufficient data: Selected risk model requires additional parameters not provided
Invalid timeframe: Use 24h, 48h, 7d, 30d, or 1y for prediction timeframe
usage: Provide patient_id, risk_model, age, and gender. Include relevant pre-calculated scores from other tools. Specify prediction_timeframe for time-specific risk estimates.

risk_category.description: Risk category: low, moderate, high, critical

contributing_factors.description: Primary factors contributing to risk score

model_performance.description: Model validation metrics and performance summary
